classes.name: ADAnswerFile
classes.description: Represents an answer file associated with a specific ESXi host.

methods.name: getContentAsXml
methods.description: Gets the content of an answer file as XML.

methods.name: addUserInputParameter
methods.description: Adds a user input parameter to the answer file.

methods.name: getUserInputParameters
methods.description: Gets a list with all user input parameters of the answer file.

methods.name: getId
methods.description: Returns the ID of the answer file.

methods.name: getMultiAdId
methods.description: Returns the multi ID of the answer file.

classes.name: ADHostProfile
classes.description: Wrapper of the VC host profile

methods.name: getName
methods.description: Returns the name of the host profile.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Name of the Auto Deploy host

attributes.name: adUri
attributes.description: URI of the Auto Deploy host

methods.name: getVcUri
methods.description: Returns a URI of the associated vCenter Server host.

methods.name: getHostProfile
methods.description: Returns a host profile with a specific name.

methods.name: createDeployRule
methods.description: Creates a deploy rule on a specific Auto Deploy host.
methods.parameters: ruleName: String, imageProfile: SoftwareImageProfile, hostProfile: ADHostProfile, location: AutoDeployItem, pattern: String

methods.name: editDeployRule
methods.description: Updates an editable deploy rule on a specific Auto Deploy host.
methods.parameters: rule: DeployRule, ruleName: String, changedPxeProfile: boolean, imageProfile: SoftwareImageProfile, changedHostProfile: boolean, hostProfile: ADHostProfile, changedLocation: boolean, location: AutoDeployItem, pattern: String

methods.name: copyDeployRule
methods.description: Updates a non editable deploy rule by making a copy of it.
methods.parameters: rule: DeployRule, ruleName: String, changedPxeProfile: boolean, imageProfile: SoftwareImageProfile, changedHostProfile: boolean, hostProfile: ADHostProfile, changedLocation: boolean, location: AutoDeployItem, pattern: String, updateSets: boolean, activate: boolean

methods.name: activateWorkingSet
methods.description: Activates all rules from the working rule set.

methods.name: activateDeployRule
methods.description: Activates a deploy rule with all rules from the working rule set.

methods.name: addToWorkingSet
methods.description: Adds a specific deploy rule to the working rule set.

methods.name: deleteDeployRule
methods.description: Deletes a deploy rule from the Auto Deploy host.

methods.name: removeFromRuleSet
methods.description: Removes a rule from a rule set without deleting the rule.

methods.name: getDeployRules
methods.description: Returns deploy rules from the Rule Engine.

methods.name: getHiddenRules
methods.description: Returns all hidden rules from the rule engine.

methods.name: getDeployRule
methods.description: Retrieves a deploy rule by name from a specific Auto Deploy host.

methods.name: getWorkingDeployRules
methods.description: Returns the deploy rules from the working rule set.

methods.name: getActiveDeployRules
methods.description: Returns deploy rules from the active rule set.

methods.name: getActiveRuleSetSize
methods.description: Returns a number of deploy rules from the active rule set.

methods.name: getWorkingRuleSetSize
methods.description: Returns a number of deploy rules in a working rule set.

methods.name: isActiveRule
methods.description: Shows if the deploy rule is active.

methods.name: isWorkingRule
methods.description: Shows if the deploy rule is added to the working rule set.

methods.name: getAnswerFileStatus
methods.description: Gets the status of an answer file for a specific ESXi host.

methods.name: clearAnswerFile
methods.description: Clears the answer file of a specific ESXi host.

methods.name: updateAnswerFile
methods.description: Updates an answer file for a specific ESXi host.

methods.name: getXmlAnswerFile
methods.description: Gets an answer file as XML.

methods.name: updateAnswerFileFromFile
methods.description: Updates an answer file for a specific ESXi host.

methods.name: retrieveAnswerFile
methods.description: Retrieves the answer file associated with a specific ESXi host.

methods.name: retrieveHostAttributes
methods.description: Retrieves the attributes of a specific ESXi host.

methods.name: getHostMatchingRules
methods.description: Retrieves all rules that apply to an ESXi host for a specific rule set.

methods.name: testRuleSetCompliance
methods.description: Checks whether the items associated with a specified ESXi host are in compliance with a specified rule set.

methods.name: repairRuleSetCompliance
methods.description: Repairs rule set compliance for a specified ESXi host.

methods.name: changeImageProfile
methods.description: Changes the image profile of a deploy rule.

methods.name: changeHostProfile
methods.description: Changes the host profile of a deploy rule.

methods.name: changeRuleLocation
methods.description: Changes the ESXi location of a deploy rule.

methods.name: getDeployOptions
methods.description: Get Auto Deploy global configuration options.

methods.name: setDeployOption
methods.description: Set value for an Auto Deploy global configuration option.

methods.name: applyImageProfile
methods.description: Associates the specified image profile with the specified ESXi hosts.

classes.name: AutoDeployItem
classes.description: Holder of the Auto Deploy object item

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Type of the Auto Deploy object item

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Value of the Auto Deploy object item

methods.name: getItemRepresentation
methods.description: Returns the item representation.

classes.name: autoDeployManager
classes.description: Provides CRUD operations for the Auto Deploy objects.

methods.name: getAutoDeploys
methods.description: Returns a list of Auto Deploy hosts from the plug-in's repository.

methods.name: getAutoDeploy
methods.description: Returns the Auto Deploy host from the plug-in's repository with a specified name.

methods.name: reloadConfiguration
methods.description: Reloads the plug-in configuration.

methods.name: addSoftwareDepot
methods.description: Adds a new public depot.

methods.name: removeSoftwareDepot
methods.description: Removes a public depot.

methods.name: updateSoftwareDepot
methods.description: Updates a public depot.
methods.parameters: depot: SoftwareDepot, depotName: String, depotURL: String

methods.name: isAnswerFileContentValid
methods.description: Checks if the XML content of an answer file is valid.

methods.name: isAnswerFileValid
methods.description: Checks if the answer file is valid.

methods.name: getAnswerFileTemplate
methods.description: Returns an XML template of the answer file.

methods.name: addAutoDeployHost
methods.description: Adds a new Auto Deploy host.

methods.name: removeAutoDeployHost
methods.description: Removes an Auto Deploy host.

methods.name: findAutoDeployHostUri
methods.description: Returns an Auto Deploy host URI.

classes.name: CheckItemResult
classes.description: Pair of current and expected rule item

classes.name: DeployRule
classes.description: Deploy rule as defined within the rule engine.

attributes.name: pxeProfileName
attributes.description: PXE profile name of the rule

attributes.name: pxeProfilePackages
attributes.description: PXE profile packages of the rule

attributes.name: editable
attributes.description: Shows if the rule is editable.

methods.name: getHostUri
methods.description: Returns the URI of the parent host.

classes.name: SoftwareChannel
classes.description: Software channel as defined in the depot.

attributes.name: imageProfiles
attributes.description: Image profiles of the software channel

methods.name: getImageProfile
methods.description: Returns an image profile with a specific name.

classes.name: SoftwareDepot
classes.description: A public depot containing all the software packages.

attributes.name: vendors
attributes.description: Software vendors defined by the software depot.

methods.name: getVendor
methods.description: Returns a software vendor with a specific name.

classes.name: SoftwareImageProfile
classes.description: Software image profile defined in the depot.

attributes.name: serialNo
attributes.description: Serial number of the image profile

attributes.name: vibs
attributes.description: List of VIBs of the image profile

classes.name: SoftwareVendor
classes.description: Software vendor as defined within the depot.

attributes.name: channels
attributes.description: Software channels defined by the software vendor.

methods.name: getChannel
methods.description: Returns a software channel with a specific name.

classes.name: UserInputParameter
classes.description: Represents a user input parameter that is part of the answer file.

attributes.name: profilePath
attributes.description: Profile path of the user input parameter

attributes.name: policyId
attributes.description: Policy ID of the user input parameter

attributes.name: parameterId
attributes.description: Parameter ID of the user input parameter

methods.name: UserInputParameter
methods.parameters: profilePath: String, policyId: String, parameterId: String

methods.name: addKeyValueParameter
methods.description: Adds a key value pair to the user input parameter.

methods.name: getParameterKeys
methods.description: Returns all the keys of the user input parameter.

methods.name: getKeyValue
methods.description: Returns the value for a specific key of the user input parameter.

methods.name: getKey
methods.description: Returns the parameter key at a specified index.

methods.name: getValue
methods.description: Returns the parameter object at a specified index.

classes.name: Vib
classes.description: Virtual infrastructure bundle defined in the depot.
